message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $87? It's a fair price considering the value you'll be getting.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
